alert.note: Alert for Fond du Lac; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 7:22PM CDT until August 03 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Fond du Lac County in east central Wisconsin... Southern Sheboygan County in east central Wisconsin... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 721 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Elkhart Lake, or 8 miles west of Plymouth, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Oostburg, Cedar Grove, Random Lake, Greenbush, Cascade, Adell, Waldo, St. Cloud, Glenbeulah, Silver Creek, Beechwood, Dundee, Gibbsville, Batavia, Town of Forest, Hingham, and New Fane. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
